title: I want to reinstall Alpha Client so hard :(
body: Guysssss help. I don't know how the old client was set on my PC after I had the Alpha Client (NOTE: riot accepted me for the alpha) and I really want it so hard, I don't know how to reinstall. Any suggestions? {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Open the new client. At the bottom, they say ''Launch legacy client''. Enjoy!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I'm on the old client not the new. Where can I find the new one? Thanks in advance dude.

You can upgrade to the Beta Client at any time from the button in the *Legacy Client's patcher*. Below is a screenshot showing where this is:

(Click to enlarge)
https://i.imgur.com/QkYEEnw.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
